short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any text field into a ChatGPT prompt and get the response right there, + Speaking and Listening abilities with ChatGPT web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the PromptGPT Chrome Extension: Streamlined Communication with ChatGPT!

The PromptGPT Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance your online communication experience. With its seamless integration, it transforms any text field, whether it's an input box, a textarea, or any editable content, into an interactive ChatGPT prompt. Gone are the days of switching between tabs or applications to get the answers you need.

One of the standout features of this extension is its ability to quickly retrieve responses from ChatGPT. By simply appending the command '!#GPT' (case insensitive and without quotes) to the end of your text prompt, you can instantly generate a comprehensive response. The response is then automatically copied to your clipboard, allowing you to effortlessly paste it back into the same text field. This eliminates the hassle of manually switching between different interfaces, saving you valuable time and effort.

Moreover, the PromptGPT goes beyond text-based interactions. It offers Speaking and Listening abilities, giving you an immersive conversational experience. Each response from ChatGPT is accompanied by a convenient Speak icon, allowing you to hear the generated response in a natural and engaging manner. Additionally, the extension provides a microphone icon for speech recognition, enabling you to dictate your prompts instead of typing them out. This feature further streamlines the communication process, making it even more effortless and efficient.

With the PromptGPT Chrome Extension, you can now access the power of ChatGPT seamlessly within your browsing experience. No longer will you have to navigate away from your current context or deal with tedious copy-pasting tasks. Install the extension today and enjoy the benefits of instant, accurate, and context-aware responses right at your fingertips.

Experience the future of conversational AI with the PromptGPT Chrome Extension. Upgrade your communication capabilities and unlock a world of efficiency and convenience. Install it now and revolutionize the way you interact with text fields online!
